venue.name: Morse Recital Hall in Sprague Memorial Hall

item.description:
﻿ Yale Jazz Ensemble

 Free

Fall concert, featuring the music of Eddie Sauter and Bill Finnegan. Thomas C. Duffy, director.

YJE's 2011-12 Season Opener. Program will feature “Rhapsody in Blue” by George Gershwin (arranged by Gordon Goodwin), and “That’s How We Roll” by Gordon Goodwin. Other music includes charts by Thad Jones, Don Menza, and Neal Hefti.

Metered parking until 7:00 on the street.  There is a Yale lot on Temple Street across form the library which is open to the public after 4:30 and it is just around the corner from Sprague Hall.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby, will wear the bw scarf with piano keys
item.name: Yale Jazz Ensemble - “That’s How We Roll”
